definitions.example: The deceased was interred in his local churchyard.

definitions.definition: One who has died. In property law, the alternate term decedent is generally used in US English. In criminal law, “the deceased” refers to the victim of a homicide.

definitions.example: The executor’s commission for winding up the deceased estate was 3.5%.

definitions.definition: One who has died. In property law, the alternate term decedent is generally used. In criminal law, “the deceased” refers to the victim of a homicide.
